text: Gryllica flavopustulata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Thomson in 1860. It is known from Brazil.BioLib.cz - Gryllica flavopustulata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Calliini Category:Beetles described in 1860
title: Gryllica flavopustulata
